homePageCarousel_rejoinRadquest_text: Continue your Radix journey in your browser. Tap to dismiss.
homePageCarousel_discoverRadix_text: Start RadQuest, learn about Radix, earn XRD and collectibles.
homePageCarousel_continueOnDapp_text: You can now connect with your Radix Wallet. Tap to dismiss.
homePageCarousel_useDappsOnDesktop_text: Connect to dApps on the big screen with Radix Connector.
homePageCarousel_discoverRadixDapps_text: Start digging into Web3 dApps on the Radix Ecosystem directory.
homePageCarousel_joinRadixRewards_text: Earn weekly Season Points by engaging in genuine on-chain activities.
